text: Okay, this isn’t the first time I've made out with the law. We've had kind of an ongoing flirtation. FILM STRIP FREEZE FRAME OF Haley running and getting tack in amall, outside a TOYS R US.
We've been on some dates. Broken up and gotten back together.
- Haley slinking around a corner, hiding something under hoodie. - Haley pulling a Gameboy out of her Hoodie: success!

And I’m not making any excuses for the fact that things haven’t worked out between us. - Haley sneaking around another corner and...returning th unopened Gameboy to its spot on the shelf, and pulling he own out of'her back pocket.

And - don't get me wrong - it’s been great knowing it’s there if I need it. - SECURITY GUARDS lecturing a mournfully nodding Haley. T let her go, and as soon as she turns the corner she’s rol her eyes like ‘what dorks.’ FILM STRIP FREEZE FRAME of Haley holding up her BOOKING NUMBERS, facing forward, covered in dirt and wreckage.
But, honestly? Until now, I haven‘t been ready for anything steady.  STICK IT ~ 2B 02/11/2005 a C) - And profile right. Followed by profile left. FLASH.
Haley handing female OFFICER FERGUSON her booking numbers
That‘s a long number for a girl my height.
Seven is a charm, huh, Haley?
You‘re not counting the three times you let me go, I guess.
Your dad says hello, by the way. (worried) He wanted me to tell you he’s not coming. Haley gamely covers her startled reaction.
But people change. And I felt like Maybe I was really ready to commit to a more serious...courtship. The SOUND of a GAVEL takes us to black.
a Reveal Haley sitting before JUDGE WESTREICH, who is casua studying the file.
Haley Graham, Haley Graham, Haley Graham. Seven incidents in two Months. You‘re in it to win it, eh, Haley? DA, LAUREN POWERS rises.

Looks to be about fourteen thousand in property damage. That's an estimate, your honor.  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 Te a Haley's father, BRICE GRAHAM - standard-variety repress entitled, big-buckled Texan contractor - coughs.
{off his cough) Like he can’t afford it. Haley's exhausted mother, ALICE DEFRANK, looks like she hasn‘t slept in years as she struggles with a TWO-YEAR OL and FIVE-MONTH OLD TWINS.
Jesus, Haley, quit it.
You first, Mom.
Save it.
You could‘ve saved all of us and given a shit. Everyone heard that. The Judge restrains a smile. oO JUDGE WESTREICH Or that. (distracted) Where did this happen?
The Crestlake. The Judge pauses.
The Graham Development? I don't suppose she has permission to run amok amongst the bulldozers? (to Brice) Mr. Graham?
Permission isn’t a word Haley's found a use for, your Honor. The Judge snorts. He is a bit confounded by the following
Haley. Are you aware that despite the fact that your father sued your mother for custody and won, he is petitioning to have you placed outside his care?
When did he care? I missed that part. (defiant) Trust me, your Honor. It’s mutual.
We'll take her, your honor.
Over my dead body.

Your attorney can familiarize you with the remedies available to you, Mrs... (scanning) DeFrank. Haley's parents get uncomfortable. Haley's mom scoffs, juggling the twins. The Judge is sympathetic to Haley.

So “your people” here have come up with two options, and I'm going to let you decide. (scanning) Texas Military Academy is one joption. Or a facility called (squinting at paper) VGA. Haley sits right up with a jolt.
Texas Military Academy, your honor. TMA’d be just perfect, thanks. The Judge nods and writes something down before picking u his gavel.
(smiling) Then VGA it is.  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 3. Haley reacts and looks at her parents who are...-.already gone.

A disheveled Haley drives in a car with SUSIE MACK, a cas worker. They pull up to a development monstrosity that ca only be described as devoid of heart, soul, spirit and an sense of taste. They sit in the driveway.

It‘s a three hour drive. Take as much time as you need. A MONSTER-TRUCK with a CALVIN & HOBBES decal on the rear window pulls into the driveway. METALLICA can be heard BLARING DULLY from inside the cab. Haley's father sits at the wheel, letting the song finish. Haley ignores him as she gets out and heads inside.

Haley saunters up to her room UPSTAIRS, we hang on THE WALL...which is lined with GYMNASTICS TROPHIES, RIBBONS a YEARLY FAMILY PHOTOS of better days...Haley, her mom and dad; a unit. The photos stop when Haley is around 12.

A thrasher pit. BMX posters. Gear. Crap, more trophies an ribbons buried under skaterat paraphernalia. Haley pulls skateboard off the wall, revealing a Poster-sized image o younger Haley as a gymnast..complete with devil horns, a tail, pitchfork, etc. The text reads: Haley Graham, Junio National Champion. However, she has crossed out the “H” s it reads “CRAMPION” Another is SIX GIRLS in US colors wav It reads, US NATIONAL TEAM. A moustache and soul patch ha been Sharpied onto her face. TRICIA SKILKEN, the oldest o the athletes, smiles broadly. Door opens. Her father slowly walks in, closing the door.
I'm sorry. I'm sorry I broke the window. I didn’t mean to do it.
Yes, you did.
No, I didn‘t. And I’m sorry you had to see Mom today.
This has nothing to do with her and everything to do with you. .
Why did you go through a custody thing when you didn‘t even want me? He can‘t take it. He raises his hand and stops himself.
(holding back tears) Newsflash: hitting me doesn‘t hurt Mom. It hurts me.
I thought we might make this work, but I was mistaken.
Why can’t you just say it? You think it‘s my fault Mom left you.
Since you knew exactly what was going on and you did nothing to stop it --
Dad. I didn’t know. I swear. Her father’ starts throwing her stuff in her bag.
I worked my ass off so you could train two thousand miles away with the best in the world, and you repay me how?
And if we'd been here, none of this ever would’ve happened, right?
Your mother is out of control and so are you. I give up, Haley.

You have to try before you can give up. It‘s in the manual. You should read it sometime. Haley‘s father smacks her on the head. .Haley stumbles, refusing to register any pain - and you almost believe he
Everything okay? Haley answers quietly; to herself, to her father.
No. Her father walks out. Haley opens her jaw. That hurt. Haley sadly shoves stuff in her bag and heads out.

They are driving as Poot and Frank start chasing them on their bikes. They cruise alongside the moving car. POOoT Yo, Cracker! What happened? Where you going? Haley rolls down her window. Susie shakes her head, but relents...they pause at a stoplight.
Juvey. Outside Houston. I'11 be yout soon. Susie gives a curious look.
Can we visit?
When you bust me out. Susie gives her another look. Haley's fighting something. Poot and Frank are completely bummed, but trying not to b PooT You know how I feel about the bust. Consider it done.
Well done. Charred to a crisp.  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 12. Haley starts welling up. The stoplight changes color.
(covering tears) Green means go. Poot shoves his phone/text messager through the window. Haley catches it awkwardly.
Use it if they don’t take it.
But what will you -- POOoT I'll steal my brother‘s.

And I got some really good shots of your jump on there -- Susie hits the gas as Haley throws her friends the metal salute through the window. ON FRANK AND POOT in the rearview mirror, just sitting th unable to wave goodbye. ON HALEY, remembering something and rolling down window.
Get my horse back!
4 POooT Did you catch that?
What? That she’s totally obsessed with me?
Why you always gotta bite my moment? Did it taste good?
Delicious.  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 73;
The building looks like it is giving off toxic rays. TROO of FEET run by with synchronized precision to SCARY MILIT FIFE and DRUM CORPS MUSIC.
A CARETAKER opens the door to a grim cinderblock cell. Ha enters, dropping her stuff. This place blows.
TIGHT SHOTS of WARDENS pacing as DETAINEES do PUSH-UPS an ROPE CLIMBING to Beasties “Looking Down the Barrel of a G

ON HALEY IN COMMUNAL BATHROOMS, brushing her teeth, rinsi her mouth. Re-applying toothpaste to toothbrush and start over. Foaming at the mouth. ON HALEY IN DORM, wrapping her unbrushed hair haphazardly into a bandanna and trucker cap. Tube-socked feet into shower sandals. Her regulation shirt and shorts on the be TIGHT ON HALEY'S GAMEBOY, as she stashes it into the back pocket of her chollo waders like a pistol.
ON HALEY'S FEET, opening the doors with a groan and a kic
FROM INSIDE, we see her figure backlit by sun and dust, i dramatic silhouette like a teenage gunslinger. She reache for some lights, and...

Anybody home? Anybody care? BAM. BAM. BAM. BAM. OVERHEAD LIGHTS flicker to life above four worthy opponents: VAULT, UNEVEN BARS, FLOOREX and BE Sun streams through older windows, dust floating through air as big, old ceiling fans turn on. Haley is alone.  — STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 14.

ECU: WEAPONS CHECK. A symphony T-SHIRTS and SHORTS gettin pulled off. ATHLETIC TAPE, DOWEL GRIPS, and CHALK DUST exploding into the air like gun powder., CLOSE ON FINGERS, WRISTS, TOES, ANKLES, FEET, CALVES and THIGHS of warriors wrapping on their protection for battl TIGHT SHOTS of EIGHT ELITE GYMNASTS (12-19) ON VAULT, BAR BEAM and FLOOR, working the equipment. FROM ABOVE we see the whole space: white walls, blue floo all business. A state-of-the-art, elite gymnastics traini facility. REVERSE POV reveals a PLEXIGLASS VIEWING BOOTH where a fe MOTHERS and SOME SULLEN SIBLINGS scrutinize the proceedin DOWNSTAIRS, THE ALPHA MALE of the operation, BURT VICKERM is pacing and surveying his ELITES. Around him swirl IVAN (Russian, 30's) and DORRIE (50's), the Assistant Coaches. INSIDE, THE ENTRANCE DOORS open. HEADS turn. Haley stands in the doorway, motionless.

There is only one thing worse than having no control over your life. THREE OLDER ELITES - JOANNE, DEVON and LACEY - share blat looks of disgust before returning to their workouts. THE FIVE YOUNGER ELITES share whispers and looks of excitement. SLO-MOTION CHECK OUT AS SHE ENTERS.... ON THE ASSISTANT COACHES, noting her arrival with disdain
It's being forced to live it with people who hate you. And I was suddenly the filling in the middle of an ‘I hate you’ sandwich. Haley enters and plops down. She immediately starts playi her Gameboy.
Meet the bread.  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 15. SFX: SUDDENLY, the SCREEN OF THE GAMEBOY is SUPERIMPOSED THE GYMNASTS, TELESCOPING IN and INTRODUCING each gymnast if she were a VIDEOGAME CHARACTER.

Joanne Charis. Four-time national champion. Five-time national Haley hater. FREEZE-FRAME ON: A whitebread white girl making the bitch priss face you‘ve ever seen. The following STATS type ove her puss. NAME: JOANNE CHARIS. AGE: 18, HOMETOWN: Wichita KS; TITLES: A crazy amount of gymnastics titles scroll on screen including FOUR-TIME NATIONAL TEAM MEMBER; TWO-TIME WORLD TEAM MEMBER; INJURIES: insane number of injuries sc on; FAVORITE EVENT: COMPLAINING; ZODIAC SIGN: BITCH. THE FREEZE-FRAME STOPS, and we watch Joanne in action, putting on her grips and staring at Haley like bullets ar going to fly out of her eyes.

You know when you stop being friends with a kid because they are a total jerk to you? FREEZE-FRAME ON: A muscular midget who looks twelve and w more boy than girl. NAME: LACEY MONAHAN. AGE: 17, HOMETOW Undecided. TITLES: 15th in the World; 5TH in World on Bar 2nd in US on bars. INJURIES: an explosion of minor and ma gymnastics related symptoms take up the ENTIRE SCREEN. FAVORITE EVENT: SIGHING. ZODIAC SIGN: LAME. We UNFREEZE on Lacey in time for her to SIGH. Joanne sidl up and the duo throw Haley some shade.
Gymnastics was that kid to me. And Lacey and Joanne were its‘ best friends. FREEZE-FRAME ON: WEI WEI and MINA, 14 and 15 respectively
And a kid like gymnastics doesn’t care if you're hurt. Doesn‘t care if you're tired. Doesn't care if you're sad. It just moves on, and finds someone new to be best friends with.
OTHER YOUNG ELITES get telescoping videogame treatment.
Gymnastics is probably the most two- faced friend you could ever have. BACK WITH HALEY on her Gameboy. Over it all. ASSISTANT COACHES IVAN and DORRIE eyeing Haley suspiciously.

And the hungriest. It eats kids for breakfast, lunch and dinner. TIGHT ON: PURPLE TRACK SUITED LEGS of BURT VICKERMAN stri through the gym with authority, GYMNASTS sitting up strai and looking serious as his figure passes them by. ANGLE ON: VARIOUS PARENTS in VIEWING GALLERY craning thei necks to see Gymnastics Personified.

And for the parents who want their daughters to be grilled gymnasts? There was only one chef in town. REVEAL BURT VICKERMAN, where charm and belligerence colli The bad mood can’t conceal his beguiling je ne sais quoi, Burt scratches his head with a well-rehearsed incredulity FREEZE-FRAME ON: Burt Vickerman. STATS type over his Signature Glare. NAME: BURT VICKERMAN. AGE: 42. TITLES: Collegiate Gymnastics 1982-1983; NCAA POMMEL HORSE All- American 1982-83; Plano Pontiac Mid-Size Salesman of the 1987-1989; Head Coach, VICKERMAN GYMNASTICS ACADEMY, 1991 PRESENT. INJURIES: Dislocated shoulder and torn bicep 198 FAVORITE EVENT: WINNING; ZODIAC SIGN: OLYMPIC RINGS.
{yelling to gym) Ladies. Read. My. Mind.
Burt Vickerman cooked up the best barbecued gymnasts West of the Mississippi. ON BURT, surveying his domain, pointing to his head.
Does my mind say ‘relax’? Maybe my mind is saying: ‘slow down,’ or ‘take it easy. (MORE )

ad STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 17. VICKERMAN (cont'd) ‘ I mean, maybe you can read my mind and it’s completely lost. Have I lost my mind? Is that why you’re staring off into space? BAM. The terrified GYMNASTS go from half-speed to high-sp
Personally? I wasn’t a fan of his sauce. Coach Vickerman strides over, looming large, extending hi hand, pulling Haley up. The furious Joanne stirs the pot.
What is she doing here?
Everyone. Haley Graham has very graciously come out of...retirement to train with us. Being out of shape isn‘t funny, so don‘t make fun of her. Get dressed, Haley.
I accidentally burned all my leotards last year. (xe: outfit) Hope this is okay. It isn't. Vick pauses, deciding he’s going to play along.
Fine. You warmed up?
To you? No.

Stretch and join vault rotation. Let's see where you're at. Haley begins a series of fluid and familiar leg stretches the corner, still playing with her Gameboy. She easily bu lazily demonstrates impressive flexibility.
Bail-ey, Bail-ey, Bail-ey. Haley uses her Gameboy as a mic.
(doing Elfie Schlagel announcer voice) (MORE )

HALEY (cont'd) She‘s not of drinking age, but Joanne Charis is still drunk on power. How is that possible, Tim, and when will she go to rehab? (doing Tim Daggett) Well, Elfie, with all those national championships under her belt, Joanne Charis thinks she rules the world.
Had you not bailed on Worlds, we may have ruled the world, but now we'll never know.

If the team had been any good they wouldn't have needed my score, now would they? Haley leaves Joanne and meanders up to the vault. The GIR look at her, like, is she really vaulting in chollo culot and a hoodie? Haley gives the girls the same look in retu
You guys are really underdressed. Haley chalks up and does an exaggerated Will Ferrell-esqu preparation at the head of the vault runway.
We’re warming up Yurchenkos. AROUND THE GYM, the Elite gymnasts are maintaining their workouts while grabbing glances at Haley's pre-vault ritu i

I prefer Tsukaharas. How bout we get this party started with a full- twisting butt-a-hara? VAULT ROTATION GIRLS share a huh? mixed with some awe. PARENTS ON THE VIEWING DECK, crane their necks to look. ON HALEY, a stern, focused stare down the runway and a peculiar bounce/skip step combo before her sprint. ON THE ELITES, now fully stopping to watch. ON HALEY, throwing a round-off onto the beat board and fl backwards onto the vault, sitting on the vault tongue lik chair, spinning and jumping off with an exaggerated finis  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 19. ON THE GIRLS, in shock at the flagrant rebellion and nervously returning to their workouts with the knowledge shit and fan are milliseconds from a collision. ON VICKERMAN, heading with scary calm in Haley’s directio
I know. My landing was a little off.

Nah. You just need to pick up your run a bit. Haley smiles. Vickerman leans in smiling, studying her...then picking her up, throwing her over his shoulder carrying her out of his gym. She wriggles. The OLD ELITES stifle LAUGHS as Joanne squeals with force bitchy laughter behind Vick’s back. Vickerman whips aroun pissed...still carrying Haley on his shoulder.
Having an attitude and being out of shape isn‘t funny. Who thought that was funny? Joanne - the culprit - points to Wei Wei and shrugs.

Gimme 100 V-ups. Wei Wei. Wei Wei sucks it up, drops and does one hundred V-ups. ON HALEY, ishooting Joanne a look of disgust from Vick’s shoulder. ON JOANNE, smiling contentedly right back at her. An AUDIBLE RIPPLE of RELIEF floats through the gym.
Shut it. All of you. Down. Now. The girls ALL DROP and robotically join the V-up madness Vickerman grabs Haley’s knapsack and carries her outta th
Vickerman carries her down the path towards...the Old Gym  STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 20.
Put me down, Shrek.
This isn’t the real world. This is my world. You don’t have to like me or like it here, but you do have to respect it.
Vickerman sits her down on a beam. Haley’s bristling.
Respect? Is that how you respect people? Throw them over your shoulder and violate their personal space?
Oh, goody, I heard you were like this, I'm so glad it’s true.
Like what? And what is it you've done to earn my respect exactly? I missed that part. Haley nods, rifling through her knapsack for something.

We have rules. We have rules for training, and the reason we have jrules and coaches is because it’s gymnastics. And because it‘s gymnastics, you could die. You could break your neck, back, an arm, a leg or the whole kit and caboodle. Haley fake yawns and checks her nonexistent watch.

And while danger and risk is the reality of what we do? It's calculated, and it can’t be calculated if you don’t respect the laws. The Laws of Gravity, for instance. Vickerman takes Haley off the beam and drops her on the m  sTICcK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 21.
I’m confused. And your point?
I get that you don‘t value your life. I mean, let‘s face it;. how could you appreciate rules that are meant to protect what you don't value? It’s not possible.
Oh, it’s possible. It‘s just not likely. Vickerman nods with flourish.
I don't particularly care if you like me or not. Haley stands up. They face off on either side of the beam
And I don't particularly care if you like me or not.
You don’t have to like me or like it here, but try and respect it.
I don’t do one-way streets.
yHow bout cul-de-sacs? Do you do those? Haley's startled. Is humor in the house?
Avenues? Back alleys? Boulevards, byways, highways, lanes or parkways? (beat) Thoroughfares?
Not if they’re one-way.
Get some rest and be here ready to a, work out at ten am tomorrow. Or we can call the judge. You decide.
The ELITES sprint by. After a beat, Haley meanders past a towards the old gym.

Haley enters the parents’ viewing deck as many YOUNGER GYMNASTS of various levels take class behind the plexi. Haley approaches Vick’s office door, listening as he talk a parent. She’s hiding, but he sees her.
Madison is very gifted. We’d like to fast track her towards becoming an Elite. It‘s a big commitment --
But twenty hours a week? She's six. I have two other children.
We'll have her into the TOPS program by the time she’s ten. Junior Elite by age 13. That‘s the goid.
You mean goal?

jRight. I guess when I look at Madison, I see gold. Olympic gold. Haley is gagging as Vick seamlessly escorts Madison’s Mom and ASHLEY'S MOM in without missing a beat. ASHLEY’S MOM Hey, Burt. I talked to my husband and if Carly devoted 20 hours a week at seven, so will Ashley.
It‘s a good gold, it really is. (catching himself) Did I say gold? I guess Ashley and gold are becoming synonymous for me. Don’t tell the other parents. I don‘t want them to feel --
Ashley's Mom smiles and seals her lips and winks.
Say no more. Thanks, Burt. Disgusted, Haley exits. Vick catches it.and smiles.
(to another mother) Mrs. LeDain? Come on in.

ECU CLOCK reads 9:48am. SILENCE. ON HALEY‘S FOOT filling the frame, surrounded by the entr doors to the gym. WITH A BANG and BLAST OF LIGHT, the door bursts open as T ELITES race into the gym. The POV makes Haley's foot look like Gulliver's, surrounded by Lilliputians.
Vick! When can we scrap the old @ long-sleeved leotards? We need new ones for Nationals. Every college will be scouting me. (to Haley) Not that you have to worry about any of that.
A new leotard might distract the ‘judges and scouts from your lack of talent. It’s a solid strategy.

Gee, Pariah Carey! Wonder why no one's scouting you for college. Oh, I forgot! You don’t matter. Joanne leaves. Vick hands Haley a rag and a scraper. They start wiping the chalk bowls and scraping the bars down.
That she can even say the word college is an indictment against the whole institution.
— Hey, fillibuster? No one cares.  7 STICK IT - 2B 02/11/2005 24. Handing her an empty magnesia wrapper.
More chalk, please. Storage closet. HALEY . Is that where you hide the candy? All the ELITES turn around longingly on the word ‘candy.’
Back to work, ladies. If you are “not going to work out, you are going to work. Now. Big pack.
The Elites workout, Joanne on beam. Devon and Lacey work flip-flops with consecutive layout step-outs. DORRIE, the unfeminine and angry assistant coach, MOANS.

Pretty feet, pretty feet, point them hard and win the meet! Haley holds up the wrapper to Dorrie who points to the storage room. Haley pulls the handle. Locked. Haley sits. ON WEI WEI and MINA, doing oversplits on stacked mats. Dorrie adjusting hips as necessary while eagle-eyeing Joa ON JOANNE doing her routine, and Haley watching. Joanne dismounts a simple single-tuck with cowboyed legs.
Deja jealous, Haley? Bring back memories? We trained together with Chris for - how long?
That'd be too long.
